facilities.cafe: The campus cafe is open from 8 AM to 6 PM.
facilities.coffee: The campus coffee bar operates from 8 AM to 6 PM.
facilities.library: The Poppleton Library is open from 7 AM to 10 PM every day.
facilities.sports: The ECA department handles the sports center. It's available for bookings between 9 AM abd 8 PM.
facilities.parking: Visitor and student parking spaces are availble near the main building.
facilities.wifi: WiFi is free for students inside the campus. Just log in with your student ID and you're good to go.
facilities.canteen: Our canteen serves delicious meals and snacks from 7 AM to 8 PM. Don't miss the Friday special!
facilities.gym: The gym is located in the sports center and is open from 6 AM to 9 PM. It's free for students!
facilities.study rooms: Quiet study rooms are available on the second floor of the library. You can book them online or at the library desk.
facilities.bookstore: Our campus bookstore, near the main entrance, offers textbooks, stationery, and Poppleton merchandise. It's open from 8 AM to 7 PM.
facilities.printing: Printing facilities are available in the library and IT lab. You can use your student ID for access.
facilities.laundry: Laundry facilities are provided in all hostels, equipped with washers and dryers. Tokens can be purchased at the hostel office.

greetings.hello: Hello! How can I assist you today?
greetings.hi: Hi, welcome back! What can I do for you?
greetings.hey: Hey, nice to see you! What's on your mind?
greetings.good morning: Good morning! How can I help?
greetings.welcome: Welcome to the University of Poppleton! How can I assist you today?
greetings.how are you: I'm here and ready to help! How can I assist you today?
greetings.nice to meet you: Nice to meet you too! Let me know how I can help.

goodbye.exit: Take care! Talk to you soon!
goodbye.see you later: See you later! Feel free to reach out anytime.
goodbye.thank you: I'm glad I could help you.

academics.fees: The tuition fees vary depending on your course and program. You can find detailed information on our website or feel free to ask for specifics about your program!
academics.admissions: Admissions for the upcoming semester close on March 20th.
academics.courses: You can explore our range of courses at www.peppleton.ac.uk/course.
academics.exam: Exam department manages the exam schedules and it will be posted on your student portal. Ensure to check it regularly for updates.
academics.registration: Course registration for the next semester begins next month. Don't miss out!
academics.scholarship: Poppleton offers a variety of scholarships for eligible students. Check out the details on our website under the 'Financial Aid and Scholarships' section, or visit the Student Support Office for assistance.
academics.library resources: Our library provides access to e-journals, e-books, and research databases. Check the library portal for more.
academics.academic calendar: You can find the latest academic calendar with important dates on the university website.
academics.labs: The computer labs are open 24/7 for students. Don't forget your ID for access!
academics.tutoring: Need help with your studies? Academic tutors are available Monday to Friday from 10 AM to 6 PM.

student_life.clubs: We have something for everyone here! Join one of our many student clubs to make the most of your life at university.
student_life.hostel: We provide a cozy and safe environment in our student hostels. Feel free to ask about room types or facilities!
student_life.mental health: We care about your well-being. Our counseling services are available Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 5 PM.
student_life.volunteering: Want to give to the community? We have several volunteering programs you can join.
student_life.cafeteria: The cafeteria is located in Building B and offers a variety of meals, including vegetarian and vegan options.
student_life.events: Keep an eye on the notice boards or the university app for upcoming student events and workshops.
student_life.transport: The university offers shuttle buses from the train station to campus. Check the schedule online.
student_life.student discounts: Your student ID gets you discounts at local shops, cinemas, and public transport!

career.placements: Our placement office helps students prepare for careers. Drop by and check out the job posting!
career.sports teams: Whether it's football, basketball, swimming, baseball or tennis, our teams are always looking for new talents. Tryouts happen each semester!
career.interships: We have strong ties with many employers. Visit the career center to explore internship opportunities!
career.career fairs: Don't miss our annual career fair in March, where top companies visit to recruit fresh talent.
career.resume help: The career center offers one-on-one sessions to help you polish your resume and cover letter.
career.networking: Our alumni network hosts monthly networking events. Join to connect with industry professionals.

events.events: The next university event, our Open Day, is scheduled for February 20th.
events.campus map: You can find a detailed campus map on our website or grab a printed copy at the information desk.
events.workshops: We regularly host skill-building workshops on coding, public speaking, and more. Check the events calendar!
events.guest lectures: Industry leaders often visit as guest lecturers. Look out for announcements on our website.
events.festivals: Our cultural festival, PoppleFest, is coming up soon! Join us for food, music, and fun!

support.helpdesk: For assistance, you can reach the helpdesk at helpdesk@poppleton.ac.uk or call 01234 567890.
support.IT support: Contact IT support at it.help@poppleton.ac.uk or visit Room 204 in the main building if you're having tech issues.
support.fees: Tuition fees can be paid online via the student portal. Installment plans are also available for your convenience.
support.medical aid: We have a medical center on campus near the hostel blocks. It's open from 9 AM to 5 PM on weekdays.
support.emergency contact: In case of emergencies, call the campus security at 01234 567891.
support.lost and found: Lost something? Check the lost and found at the main reception desk in Building A.

fun_facts.university: Did you know? The University of Poppleton was founded in 1902 and has over 20,000 students!
fun_facts.library: Fun Fact: Our library holds over 1 million books and is one of the largest in the region.
fun_facts.sports: Did you know? Our university's football team won the national championship 3 times in a row!
fun_facts.cafeteria: Did you know our cafeteria serves over 1,000 meals daily?
fun_facts.campus: Our campus spans over 200 acres, with lush greenery and modern architecture.
fun_facts.students: Poppleton has students from over 80 countries, making it a vibrant and diverse community!

location.address: The University of Poppleton is located at 123 Poppleton Lane, Poppleton, PO12 3AB.
location.map: You can find us on Google Maps by searching for 'University of Poppleton.'
location.transport: Poppleton is well-connected by trains and buses. The nearest train station is just 10 minutes from campus.
